medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began immediately after eating azufaifa, which was previously tolerated. The patient experienced urticaria, angioedema, rhinoconjunctivitis, dyspnea, wheezing, abdominal pain, diarrhea, and sickness. She progressively improved after treatment and symptoms subsided within 24 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of latex allergy (contact urticaria, rhinoconjunctivitis, and asthma) and food allergies (banana, chestnut, kiwi, avocado).
medical_history.social_history: The patient is a nurse with possible occupational exposures to allergens.
